promptPrefix: Create a post that will be successful on all social media platforms: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Google Business Profile, and YouTube. I will provide you with the content [PROMPT] of the posts. Make sure to include a hashtag, emojis, and a keyword that is relevant to your post. Keep your post within the character limit for each platform: Facebook (15801.5 Tokens), Twitter (70 Tokens), Instagram (550 Tokens), Pinterest (125 Tokens) LinkedIn (175 Tokens), Google Business Profile (375 Tokens), and YouTube (no character limit). Don't repeat yourself (DRY). Write all output in English. [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: All in one Social post
